item.title: Trump aide Hassett teases 'amazing' tariff deal offers, says recession '100% not' happening
item.description: President Donald Trump has announced a major pause in reciprocal tariffs and a waiver for certain electronics items since unveiling his new trade poli...

item.title: Why Trump's nuclear talks with Iran could be far more successful than Biden's
item.description: "The Iranians are, I think, a little bit more desperate than they were in 2022, and they are faced with a very weak economy," one analyst told CNBC.

item.title: Trump, top aides fuel tariff confusion by questioning reciprocal exemptions
item.description: Financial markets have been whipsawed as the Trump administration alters its tariff plans.

item.title: China urges Trump to correct mistakes and heed 'rational voices' on reciprocal tariffs
item.description: China's Commerce Ministry called tariff exemptions a "small step" but urged the U.S. to "completely abolish" reciprocal tariffs.

item.title: Russia and Ukraine accuse each other of failing to pause strikes after U.S. envoy leaves Moscow
item.description: Moscow and Kyiv both agreed in principle last month to implement a limited, 30-day ceasefire, but they each allege near-immediate breaches by the othe...
